plot: The morning after a wild hot tub party, Tom and Jen wake up to find themselves hungover and trapped in a spare bedroom, not a stitch of clothing in sight, with little to do other than come to terms with their awkward predicament.
title: Early Risers
plot_es: The morning after a wild hot tub party, Tom and Jen wake up to find themselves hungover and trapped in a spare bedroom, not a stitch of clothing in sight, with little to do other than come to terms with their awkward predicament.
plot_en: The morning after a wild hot tub party, Tom and Jen wake up to find themselves hungover and trapped in a spare bedroom, not a stitch of clothing in sight, with little to do other than come to terms with their awkward predicament.
